entry.title: BIP Submission
entry.summary: Ben Reeves has submitted a draft BIP, or Bitcoin Improvement Proposal, for discussion and possible formal review. The proposal is an alternative to BIP 16, also known as "/P2SH/". The draft can be found on the Bitcoin Wiki page under the name "BIP M of 2 DRAFT". Reeves has requested feedback and comments from the community regarding his proposed BIP.
